page.title: 03Finchingfield amenities.
page.content: Finchingfield is supposed to be the prettiest village in Essex. In Finchingfield there are a lot of buildings.There are 7 shops,4 pubs, 1 tea room, 1 restaraunt, 2 garages, a Church, a chapel, doctors surgery, a guild hall, 1 village hall and 1 school. One of the most used buildings is the village hall.It is used for a lot of things such as Youth club,badminton, Carpet bowls, Discos, Veterans Club and the Finchingfield Players. The hall of the United Reform Church is also used for Brownies etc. The playingfields is where people go for sports and to play Football and Cricket. There is also a play area where there are some swings,a climbing frame and a sand pit.The scout hut where cubs and scouts meet is here as well as horse riding and BMX areas.
